mapper.sql: dept_id, pid, pids, dept_name, dept_code, description, sort, system_code, creator_id, creator_name, create_date,updator_id,updator_name,update_date
mapper.select: select dept_id "id", pid "pid", dept_name "title", ( CASE WHEN (pid = 0 OR pid IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) "spread" from sys_dept
select dept_id "id", pid "pId", dept_name "name", ( CASE WHEN (pid = 0 OR pid IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) "open" from sys_dept

SELECT dept_id "id", pid "pId", dept_name "name", 'dept' AS "nodeType", NULL AS "iconSkin", ( CASE WHEN ( pid = 0 OR pid IS NULL OR pid = '' ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) "open" FROM sys_dept UNION SELECT user_id "id", dept_id "pId", user_name "name", 'user' AS "nodeType", 'user' AS "iconSkin", ( CASE WHEN ( dept_id = 0 OR dept_id IS NULL OR dept_id = '' ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) "open" FROM sys_user

SELECT d.dept_id "id", d.pid "pId", d.dept_name "name", 'dept' AS "nodeType", NULL AS "iconSkin", ( CASE WHEN ( d.pid = 0 OR d.pid IS NULL ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) "open", ( CASE WHEN ( d2.dept_id = 0 OR d2.dept_id IS NULL ) THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END ) "checked" FROM sys_dept d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dept_id FROM sys_dept WHERE LOCATE(dept_id,fn_user_access_dept ( #{accessId} ))) d2 ON d.dept_id = d2.dept_id UNION SELECT u.user_id "id", u.dept_id "pId", u.user_name "name", 'user' AS "nodeType", 'user' AS "iconSkin", ( CASE WHEN ( u.dept_id = 0 OR u.dept_id IS NULL ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) "open", ( CASE WHEN ( a.user_id = 0 OR a.user_id IS NULL ) THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END ) "checked" FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_access a ON a.user_id = u.user_id AND a.access_id = #{accessId}

select
from sys_dept where 1 = 1
and dept_name like CONCAT('%',#{deptName},'%')
and (dept_id = #{deptId} or dept_id in ( select dept_id from sys_dept where pids like CONCAT('%$[', #{deptId}, '$]%') escape '$' ))
order by sort ASC

SELECT a.dept_id, a.pid, a.pids, a.dept_code, a.dept_name, b.dept_name "pname", a.description, a.sort, a.creator_id, a.creator_name, a.create_date, a.updator_id, a.updator_name, a.update_date FROM sys_dept a LEFT JOIN sys_dept b ON a.pid = b.dept_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.dept_id = #{deptId}
